question: Identify the social media engagement trends for companies in the technology industry based on their social media profiles.

subtasks.task: Select companies operating in the technology industry from the CompanyInfo table based on their Industry column.
Gather social media engagement data (likes, comments, engagement rates) from all relevant social media tables (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Youtube) for the identified companies.
Analyze the collected social media engagement data to identify trends and patterns in engagement for companies in the technology sector.
